name: Soul Medicine
description: Soul Medicine a multilingual digital service designed to deliver critical information in bite-sized pieces for survivors of abuse, available online or sent direct to your email inbox

SDGs.evidenceText: We have several guides on how to take care of your wellbeing especially targeted towards survivors of different forms of abuse. Our resources are trauma informed to ensure that survivors find a way to use these tools to build on their resilience while dealing with abuse.
We have resources for women and non-binary to help them get back on their feet, while dealing with abuse.
